item.title: Remove Unused Css Styles From Bootstrap Using Purgecss
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Reducing assets size is one of the most practical ways to speed up your web application. I have a simple use case, lets imagine your HTML file looks like this
